reasoning: To provide a more comprehensive understanding of "pork", I will explore its history, technological advancements in pork production, current practices, and potential future trends. This will allow me to identify terms associated with pork production and consumption across different time periods for query expansion.
historical_foundation: Early pork consumption in ancient civilizations (China, Rome)
development_milestones: Development of concentrated animal feeding operations (CAFOs)
Advances in pig genetics and breeding
Introduction of antibiotics and growth promoters
Development of processed pork products (ham, bacon, sausage)
current_landscape: Diverse pork products and culinary applications
emerging_trends: Alternative protein sources for pig feed
